22-007SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, February 24, 2022.Carlos Ovalle spoke.Page 1 of 5TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, MARCH 24, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESPete Marsh spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Novak, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbstain: 1 - Alan TolkoffAbsent: 1 - Eric Rock2.

22-008SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Water Department providing an update on the Drought and Water Conservation.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Andrea Bell spoke.Carlos Ovalle spoke.Pete Marsh spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Dean Page 2 of 5TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, MARCH 24, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESWang, Manager of Water Resources.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources.Commissioner Gonzales spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Dean Wang, Manager of Water Resources, spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Bergeron-Birge, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Sona Coffee, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 1 - Eric Rock3.
